mapper.insert: insert into manager values(#{managerId}, #{managerPassword}, #{managerCode}, #{managerCodeImgOriginal}, #{managerCodeImgRenamed}, #{managerName}, #{managerPhone}, #{managerEmail}, #{managerAddress}, default, default)
mapper.select: select count(*) from(select memberId as userId from(select memberId from member union all select managerId from manager)) where userId=#{userId}
select * from member where memberId like '%'||#{memberId}||'%'

update.if: update member set memberPassword=#{newPwd} where memberId=#{userId}
update manager set managerPassword=#{newPwd} where managerId=#{userId}
